description:
cmd/gc: fix corruption in export of &T{} literals.

Composite literals using the &T{} form were incorrectly
exported, leading to weird errors at import time.

Fixes issue 4879.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM

I'm glad you managed to get this working. I tried and felt like I was
playing whac-a-mole with &s.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=e73800eb2b00 ***

cmd/gc: fix corruption in export of &T{} literals.

Composite literals using the &T{} form were incorrectly
exported, leading to weird errors at import time.

Fixes issue 4879.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7395054

subject: code review 7395054: cmd/gc: fix corruption in export of &T{} literals.
